description: Phase 0 - Project Initialization: Set up Bun monorepo with TypeScript, Biome, and scaffold all packages

userStories.title: Initialize Bun Workspace Root
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a properly configured monorepo root so that all packages can share dependencies and build configuration.

userStories.title: Configure TypeScript Base
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a base TypeScript configuration so that all packages have consistent compilation settings.
acceptanceCriteria: Root tsconfig.json with strict mode enabled
Each package has tsconfig.json extending root

userStories.title: Configure Biome
userStories.description: As a developer, I need consistent linting and formatting so code style is uniform across all packages.
acceptanceCriteria: Root biome.json with lint and format rules
bun run lint script works from root
bun run format script works from root

userStories.title: Scaffold Core Package
